instance_template: passenger(w; g; c). side(l; r). other(l, r). other(r, l). #const n=7. time(0..n).
generator: at(f, l, 0). at(P, l, 0) :- passenger(P). { load(P, T) : passenger(P), at(P, S, T), at(f, S, T) } 1 :- time(T), T < n. at(f, S2, T+1) :- at(f, S1, T), other(S1, S2), T < n. at(P, S2, T+1) :- load(P, T), at(P, S1, T), other(S1, S2), T < n. at(P, S, T+1) :- passenger(P), at(P, S, T), not load(P, T), T < n.

hard_constraints.description: It is strictly prohibited for the wolf and the goat to occupy the same bank in the absence of the farmer's presence.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(w, S, T), at(g, S, T), not at(f, S, T), side(S), time(T).

hard_constraints.description: It is mandatory that the goat and the cabbage are not situated on the same bank unless the farmer is also present on that bank.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(g, S, T), at(c, S, T), not at(f, S, T), side(S), time(T).

hard_constraints.description: The farmer must be located on the right bank at the terminal time step.
Every passenger must be located on the right bank at the terminal time step.
